title: Good game, too many microtransactions
text: The game is great and has a very active player base. However, I very much dislike the constant popups begging for my money. Even the free daily mini games constantly bombard you with payment options. Being offered "special" cues, etc between matches is also annoying, especially when you go bankrupt. I play this game on the toilet, I don't have time to waste declining all these offers.

title: $$$$ to stay in it.
text: Great game at first but now itâ€™s a scam at every level, but it requires an expenditure of real cash to move up after a certain level, and itâ€™s not cheap to stay in the game, your shots become less accurate after not spending cash to upgrade the many, many enticements offered to players. It gets frustrating after a while, but you have a multitude of cues, upgrades to cues, (I have earned over 100) and options too numerous to list for upgrading your status. The game gets ridiculous after a while and balances out only if you spend a LOT of cash.
